availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Obediah F. McCoy (Greenup County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Judith Ann Knight McCoy in November 1832 in Mason County, Kentucky. Married to Casandra Chinn McCoy. Father of J. A. McCoy, Sarah McCoy, Ella McCoy, C. H. McCoy, James R. McCoy, and John McCoy. Ward of William P, King, Mary King and Thomas King. Farmer in Greenup County in 1850. Employed William Brown as a laborer in Greenup County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Greenup County in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
